info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 26 at 9:17PM EDT until May 26 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR CABARRUS...DAVIE...SOUTHEASTERN IREDELL...MECKLENBURG...ROWAN AND NORTHEASTERN YORK COUNTIES... At 916 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near East Bend to near Mocksville to 8 miles northwest of Kannapolis to 10 miles northwest of Indian Land, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Uptown Charlotte, Huntersville, Kannapolis, Downtown Concord, Salisbury, Mocksville, Central Charlotte, Northeast Charlotte, Southwest Charlotte and East Charlotte. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
